EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Scott, I noticed you worked for Verizon for a number of years before becoming the leader of IT at Jackson Health System and I was hoping that we could have a discussion around why Verizon has chosen our platform to allow them to deliver the best kind performance to their customers within their Intelligent Cloud Control practice. <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/videos/1047]]> So you have some insight as to the problem Turbonomic solves, other healthcare organization like Altegra Health and Baptist Health (more local examples) use Turbonomic in their internal data centers to help them run more efficiently within their virtual environment, while allowing them to assuring performance of their most critical EMR and EHR apps. The reason they chose us over the any other virtualization platforms out there is because of our unique automation allowing our customers to: · Increase VM to host density – increasing efficiency by 30% (and defers future hardware cost with in-depth planning capabilities)· Increase application uptime by 35%+ · Decrease amount of alerts and time spent firefighting in the environment This allows our customers to save a large sum of budget usually spent on hardware, and properly allows them to plan for the new aspects of the infrastructure like a hyperconverged infrastructure, or investments in the public/private cloud offerings. <[[https://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-and-HPE-Data-Sheet.pdf]]> Do you have ten minutes to discuss a potential partnership to see if we could do the same for you and the team at Jackson Health System? Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
